SELECT cm.order_id, cm.from_city, cm.to_city,cm.inner_channel, CONVERT(cm.ticket_pay_money, CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money, CONVERT(cm.bx_pay_money, CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, CONVERT(cm.ps_pay_money, CHAR) AS ps_pay_money, CONVERT(cm.pay_money, CHAR) AS pay_money, cm.order_status, DATE_FORMAT(cm.pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, DATE_FORMAT(cm.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, cm.train_no, DATE_FORMAT( cm.from_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS from_time, cm.out_ticket_billno, cm.user_id, cm.out_ticket_type, cm.opt_ren, DATE_FORMAT( cm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time FROM inner_orderinfo AS cm WHERE 1 = 1
cm.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
cm.user_id=#user_id:VARCHAR#
cm.out_ticket_billno=#out_ticket_billno:VARCHAR#
cm.create_time >= #begin_info_time:VARCHAR#
cm.create_time < DATE_ADD(#end_info_time:VARCHAR#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order_status in
#order_status[]:VARCHAR#
inner_channel in
#inner_channel[]:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY cm.create_time DESC LIMIT #everyPagefrom:Integer#, #pageSize:Integer#

SELECT cm.order_id,cm.order_status,cm.user_id,cm.inner_channel, cm.pay_money,DATE_FORMAT(cm.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time,cm.out_ticket_billno, cm.out_ticket_type,DATE_FORMAT(cm.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, NULL AS fund_type, cm.from_city,cm.to_city,DATE_FORMAT(cm.from_time,'%H:%i') AS from_time, DATE_FORMAT(cm.to_time,'%H:%i') AS to_time,cm.travel_time, CONVERT(cm.ticket_pay_money,CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money,CONVERT(cm.bx_pay_money,CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, CONVERT(cm.ps_pay_money,CHAR) AS ps_pay_money,cm.pay_money, ps.link_name,ps.link_phone,ps.link_mail,cm.train_no, cm.seat_type, ps.link_address,ps.pay_money,ps.ps_status, cm.buy_money,IFNULL(cm.refund_deadline_ignore,0)AS refund_deadline_ignore,ps.ps_billno ,cm.refund_total,ps.ps_company, cm.refund_total,cm.inner_channel, cm.user_id FROM inner_orderinfo AS cm LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo_ps ps ON cm.order_id = ps.order_id WHERE cm.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT COUNT(cm.order_id) FROM inner_orderinfo cm WHERE 1 = 1
cm.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
cm.user_id=#user_id:VARCHAR#
cm.out_ticket_billno=#out_ticket_billno:VARCHAR#
cm.create_time >= #begin_info_time:VARCHAR#
cm.create_time < DATE_ADD(#end_info_time:VARCHAR#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order_status in
#order_status[]:VARCHAR#
inner_channel in
#inner_channel[]:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp.cp_id,cp.order_id,cp.user_name,cp.train_box,cp.seat_no, cp.ticket_type,cp.ids_type, cp.user_ids,cp.telephone, cp.create_time,cp.pay_money, cp.buy_money,cp.modify_time,cp.seat_type,(hp.name)AS name_type,bx.bx_code FROM inner_orderinfo_cp cp LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo_bx bx ON cp.cp_id=bx.cp_id LEFT JOIN inner_productinfo hp ON bx.product_id=hp.product_id WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT bx.bx_id,bx.order_id,bx.from_name, bx.to_name,bx.ids_type,bx.user_name, bx.user_ids,bx.create_time,bx.modify_time, bx.telephone,bx.bx_status,bx.bx_code, bx.bx_billno,bx.pay_money,bx.buy_money FROM cp_orderinfo_bx bx WHERE bx.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hs.history_id, hs.order_optlog, DATE_FORMAT(hs.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, hs.opter FROM inner_orderinfo_history hs WHERE hs.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# order by hs.create_time asc

SELECT hm.order_id,hm.refund_money,DATE_FORMAT(hm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')AS create_time, hm.refund_time,hm.user_remark,hm.our_remark, hm.refund_plan_time, hm.refund_status, hm.opt_person,hm.refund_type FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream hm where hm.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
